Understate: The claim may be understating the extent to which Atlanta's transportation needs are covered by the referendum, as the expert's verdict mentions that "less than one-tenth" of the needs are covered.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks specific evidence or data to support the statement that "less than one-tenth of Atlanta's transportation needs are covered" in the referendum.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the proposed 1-cent sales tax is intended to cover all of Atlanta's transportation needs, which may not be the case.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide alternative explanations for why the proposed 1-cent sales tax may not cover most of Atlanta's transportation needs.
